revisionDesc.change: Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;1;7' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;2;38'
This file ought to be renamed. I forgot to do so previously.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Add proper syntax for columns. Lin5 no app, --> [ταυτ]η̣ν ι(¨); lin7--> ὑπ̣<:[ca; lin8--> [δέ]σ̣ποτ[α][.3]ς; lin9--> ἀδι[κ][.9]; lin14--:> τ̣ό̣τ̣ε̣ [ca.18]; lin15 π̣α̣ρ̣᾿ἐ̣[μοὶ] --> π̣α̣ρ̣’ ἐ̣[μοὶ]; lin16 δ᾿ --> δ’; lin17--> <:[ca.12]|alt:|[ἃ δὲ ἀναπλεῖν](?):> ; lin19--> πα̣[ρ’; lin21--> καθ’; lin22bis delete; lin23--> αὐτὸς \.2[.?]/; lin26--> κα[τ’; lin27,30(2x)--> δι’; lin30--> ὑπ̣’ [α]ὐ̣το̣ῦ̣; lin37--> <:[ca.15]|alt:| [καθολικότητος(?)]:>. Lins42a-59 renumber 42a,intercolumnar. etc. (I think this should parse) and get rid of the Div; renumber following lins as in ed (43-55 --> 60-72); add notes in lin42,60 indicating intercolumnar insertion; add 62. lost.?lin at end; end col.ii div at end of lin62. Lin63-66 enclose in div .msup; lin63--> <:ἀλλ’|reg|ἀλλ*apostrophe*:>. Delete lin46=64bis; lin64--> δὲ \τ̣ὸ̣/ ἡμ̣[έτερον; lin64--> \ἀ̣ν̣αγκαίως/ καὶ; lin64,66 use proper dbl sq brackets; lin67-72 enclose in div .msperpendicular; lin70--> α.7δ̣.5τ̣ο̣ν

Entered text of P.Ammon II 38 (olim P.Ammon I 7) from digital copy proofread against print edition. I'm not sure about line 13bis because in the original edition the missing line is uncertain. I've changed the line numbers after line 42 because I don't know how to render the intercolumnar text.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; fixed hyphens in supplied
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
